actions.text: Amendment SA 821 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 34.
Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S447; text: CR S447) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting infringement on the free exercise of religion.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 821 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 34.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 821 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 34.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Lee.

purpose: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting infringement on the free exercise of religion.
